commands.name: az sphere device capability apply
commands.summary: Temporarily apply a capability session on the attached device.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device capability apply [--capability-file]
                                  [--none {false, true}]
examples: az sphere device capability apply --capability-file myCapabilities.cap

commands.name: az sphere device capability download
commands.summary: Download a device capability file from the Azure Sphere Security Service.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device capability download --catalog
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--device]
                                     [--output-file]
                                     [--type {ApplicationDevelopment, FieldServicing}]
examples: az sphere device capability download --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --device <DeviceIdValue> --type ApplicationDevelopment --output-file myCapabilities.cap
az sphere device capability download --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --device <DeviceIdValue> --output-file myCapabilities.cap

commands.name: az sphere device capability show-attached
commands.summary: Show the current device capability configuration of the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device capability update
commands.summary: Update the device capability configuration for the attached device.
examples: az sphere device capability update --capability-file myCapabilities.cap
az sphere device capability update --capability-file myCapabilities.cap --device <DeviceIdValue>
